ground_truth.thought: 基于分析，推荐适合普通投资者的旅游项目
ground_truth.name: ChinaTourism.recommend_investment_project

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail', 'description': 'Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': ''}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'company address'}, {'name': 'homepage_url', 'description': ''}, {'name': 'description', 'description': 'A description of the company and what they do/offer'}, {'name': 'list_date', 'description': 'The date that the symbol was first publicly listed'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.search_stock_ticker', 'description': 'get the stock ticker given the company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'ChinaTourism.get_investment_data', 'description': 'Get the tourism investment data for a specified period in China.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'period', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the period for which to get the data, e.g., last_year, last_quarter'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'investment_data', 'description': 'the investment data for the specified period'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我想了解人民币市场的旅游情况。首先，获取过去一年中国的旅游投资数据。然后，分析这些数据，找出旅游投资增长较快的领域。接着，获取这些领域的详细信息，包括政策支持和市场前景。最后，基于这些分析，推荐适合普通投资者的旅游项目。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取过去一年中国的旅游投资数据
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
ChinaTourism.get_investment_data
当前工具的参数'period'的值是什么?
last_year
{'investment_data': {'total_investment': 1200000000, 'growth_rate': 15.3, 'top_sectors': ['ecotourism', 'cultural_heritage', 'adventure_tourism']}}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'investment_data': {'total_investment': 1200000000, 'growth_rate': 15.3, 'top_sectors': ['ecotourism', 'cultural_heritage', 'adventure_tourism']}}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
分析旅游投资数据，找出增长较快的领域
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
ChinaTourism.analyze_investment_data
当前工具的参数'data'的值是什么?
{'total_investment': 1200000000, 'growth_rate': 15.3, 'top_sectors': ['ecotourism', 'cultural_heritage', 'adventure_tourism']}
{'analysis_result': {'fastest_growing_sector': 'ecotourism', 'growth_rate': 20.5}}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'analysis_result': {'fastest_growing_sector': 'ecotourism', 'growth_rate': 20.5}}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取生态旅游领域的详细信息，包括政策支持和市场前景
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
ChinaTourism.get_sector_details
当前工具的参数'sector'的值是什么?
ecotourism
{'sector_details': {'policy_support': 'Government provides subsidies and tax incentives for ecotourism projects.', 'market_prospect': 'Expected to grow by 25% annually over the next five years.'}}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'sector_details': {'policy_support': 'Government provides subsidies and tax incentives for ecotourism projects.', 'market_prospect': 'Expected to grow by 25% annually over the next five years.'}}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?

prediction: 基于分析结果，推荐适合普通投资者的旅游项目。
